Pathway.Name: Progeria-associated lipodystrophy
Pathway.Comment: Progeroid syndromes are a group of diseases that cause premature aging in the affected. In this pathway, the progeroid diseases, which also show lipodystrophy in the affected, are in red and linked to these are the genes that are mutated for these diseases. These genes are specifically linked to lipodystrophy.

Interaction.Comment: uncertain if insulin is regulated by the potassium channels

Label.TextLabel: Growth arrest Apoptosis Cell migration etc.
DNA replication RNA transcription Cell cycle regulation Mehcanical support etc.
